data.title: ABETTOR:-encourager
data.description: He was accused of being an abettor  and having connection with the underworld Dons.

data.title: ABJURE:- renounce upon oath
data.description: Pinocchio(the cartoon character)abjured not to tell lies in future

data.title: ABLUTION:-washing
data.description: Performing  their  ablution in the River Ganges grants spiritual  benefit to the individual.

data.title: ABNEGATION:-repudiation; self-sacrifice
data.description: Abnegation is a natural way of life for a monk in the  monastery.

data.title: ABOLISH:- cancel; put an end to
data.description: The old system of hand pulled rickshaws has been abolished  as they are now considered inhuman  remnants of the British  Raj.

data.title: ABOMINATE:-loathe; hate
data.description: Raja Ram Mohan Roy abominated the cruel custom of Sati and abolished the practice.

data.title: ABORIGINAL:-being the first of its kind in a region
data.description: The Government is adopting special measures for safe guarding the   aboriginal      tribes.

data.title: ABRADE:-erode, wear away by friction
data.description: Footwear  gets abraded by constant usage

data.title: ABRIDGE:-condense or shorten
data.description: The Abridged  version of the original Shakespeare text is easier for children to read.
